sections.comments: Renal PharmacotherapeuticsRegistration by permission only: Send a brief paragraph stating the reason(s) why you would like to register for the course to Dr. Verma (arun.verma@ubc.ca).Please note that all PHRM 326 sessions will be delivered online for 2020W.
instructors: in one of these programs: PHRMD

description: Case-based approach to the pathophysiology, pharmacology, clinical pharmacokinetics, and pharmacotherapy in nephrology with emphasis on the integration and application of fundamental principles to clinical situations in class.
